title: ZK I Zettel 7,2m24d2 - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:
7,2m24d2
					but are judged in the light of an elaboratedethical code. This code rests on a myth … The social values and sentiments of any industrialgroup of workers, in so far as that group is integrated,will be found to run a course not unlike that justdepicted …"
